abstract: Business Week covers Citigroup without mentioning its own columnist
snippet: Business Week covers Citigroup without mentioning its own columnist
lead_paragraph: Business journalists, myself included, have been fascinated by the Maria Bartiromo-Citigroup story, which David Carr discussed in today’s Times. When I was in Davos at the World Economic Forum last week, it was a major topic of coversation. Government officials and business leaders asked me if she would keep her job. Some were amazed when I said I thought she would.
